author: ate
msg: The PortletURLProviderImpl now is only used by Pluto for generation of a "normal" PortletURL.
The other usage for generating Portal DecoratorAction urls now no longer uses this but directly uses the PortalURL for that.

author: ate
msg: Render parameters are now properly cleared conforming to the Portlet API requirements.
Also fixed: when using SessionFullNavigationalState (the default), encoded stated of the targeted PortletWindow ended up being postfixed
in the encoded state of the last non-targeted PortletWindow.

author: ate
msg: PortletWindowActionState no longer used (see comments on issue: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-222).

author: ate
msg: Also (see issue comments) fixes Portlet API requirement to keep Render Parameters on activation of a DecoratorAction by no longer caching these.
Finally, support true browser caching on the DecoratorAction image links by no longer embedding encoded NavigationalState.

author: ate
msg: Defined custom WindowStates RESTORED and SECURED and derived the RESTORE and SECURE action names from them.
